articles.title: U.S. Imperialists Will Face Final Doom: DPRK NDC
articles.content:
U.S. Imperialists Will Face Final Doom: DPRK NDC
						
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Obama announced new "additional sanctions" on the DPRK through a "presidential executive order" at the outset of the year and slandered it as "the most isolated, severed and cruel dictatorial state" on Jan. 22.
					 Not content with it, he cried out for bringing down the DPRK at an earlier date though information inflow by cyber warfare, saying such regime would collapse with passage of time.
					
					 Meanwhile, politicians and military bosses of the U.S. have vied with each other in calling for tightened siege and blockade against the DPRK through re-listing of sponsor of terrorism and "high-profile additional sanctions".
					
					 Typical of this is that the U.S. decided to stage war drills it planned in south Korea and its vicinity, including the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises under the pretext of "keeping alliance system", held a secrete confab to disable the nukes and missiles of the DPRK at the command of the special operation force in Florida State, and then formed even the U.S.-south Korea joint division to put it into practice.
					
					 In this regard the National Defence Commission of the DPRK in a statement on Feb. 4 clarified the following principled stand of its army and people:  
					
					 1. Now that the brigandish U.S. imperialists' hostile policy toward the DPRK is getting extremely ferocious, the army and people of the DPRK will take stronger counteraction of justice to shatter it.
					
					 Once the U.S. policy makers were so impudent that they had no hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 But, Obama revealed himself that the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK is the harshest hostile policy and it is chiefly aimed to "bring down" the DPRK.
					
					 As long as the U.S. imperialists' hostile policy towards the DPRK is getting evermore ferocious at an extreme phase, its army and people will indefinitely ratchet up its retaliatory action of justice to counter the mounting mud-slinging of the Obama group at them, its escalating harsh sanctions and pressure and the ever-expanding scale and scope of war drills against it.
					
					 The U.S. should clearly know it is long since the words that the U.S. imperialists are the sworn enemy became phraseology commonly used by all people and the whole army of the DPRK and the resolution to take revenge upon the U.S.  under the slogan "Let's wipe out and annihilate the enemy and give death to him!" shaking this land is now growing so strong that they are ready to dash ahead like the wind towards the center of the U.S., the cesspool of crimes.
					
					 2. Now that the gangster-like U.S. imperialists' military strategy towards the DPRK is inching close to the stage of igniting a war of aggression, the just counteraction of the army and people of the DPRK will be focused on inflicting the bitterest disasters upon the United States of America.
					
					 By origin, the U.S. imperialists are a group of gangsters accustomed to making profound confusing of right and wrong and unleashing a war on the basis of plots and lies.
					
					 It was none other than the U.S. which escalated the Vietnam war of aggression by faking up the Bac Bo Gulf case and occupied Iraq by orchestrating a farce called "operation to eliminate weapons of mass destruction". It was again the U.S. which ignited the Korean war under the pretext of "southward invasion" in the 1950s.
					
					  Today the Obama group is going so foolish as to try to "bring down" the DPRK through a cyber warfare by fabricating the non-existent "human rights issue" of the DPRK and floating the fiction about its "cyber attack" on the Sony Pictures Entertainment.
					
					 Under this dangerous situation the army and people of the DPRK have decided to write the last page of the U.S. history of shameful defeat about its final ruin exactly on the U.S. land by dint of Paektusan arms.
					
					 If the U.S. ignites a war of aggression against the DPRK by conventional forces, it will fight it by conventional forces of its style, if the former unleashes a nuclear war against the latter, it will counter it through its own nuclear strikes, and if the former tries to bring down the latter through a cyber warfare, it will react to it with its own preeminent cyber warfare and will thus bring earlier the final ruin of the U.S. This is a decisive option of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. had better clearly know that the DPRK's smaller, precision and diversified nuclear striking means and ground, naval, underwater, air and cyber warfare means will be used through the service personnel and people's display of the strongest mental power and indomitable ideology and will which the gangster-like U.S. imperialists can never think of and by the Juche-oriented strategy and tactics and unique war methods unprecedented in human history of wars.
					
					 3. It is the decision of the army and people of the DPRK to have no longer need or willingness to sit at negotiating table with the U.S. since the latter seeks to stamp out the ideology of the former and "bring down" its social system.
					
					 The Obama group is so impudent as to claim repeatedly that the DPRK should be led to changes and "collapse" of social system through "two-way strategy"--"pressure" and "dialogue" by force.
					
					 Since the gangster-like U.S. imperialists are blaring that they will "bring down" the DPRK, oblivious of its poor plight facing adverse fate, the army and people of the DPRK cannot but officially notify the Obama administration of the USA that the DPRK has neither need nor willingness to sit at negotiating table with the U.S. any longer.
					
					 The U.S. should no longer talk under the eyes of the world such nonsense that dialogue will be impossible before "change".
					
					 The tradition of eternal victory for the DPRK and disgrace and defeat for the U.S. imperialists, recorded in the past history of showdown between the DPRK and the U.S., will be carried forward forever.
					
					 Running high are the extraordinary spirit and readiness of the army and people of the DPRK to turn out in the toughest battle to settle accounts with the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists, engrossed in the hostile policy toward the DPRK century after century, should be mindful that the time of nightmare is coming nearer when they will meet the most disastrous, final doom on the U.S. mainland.

articles.title: DPRK FM Sends Letters to UN Secretary-General and UNGA Session President
articles.content:
DPRK FM Sends Letters to UN Secretary-General and UNGA Session President
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minster Ri Su Yong on Jan. 2 sent a letter separately to the secretary-general of the UN and the president of the 69th Session of the UN General Assembly in connection with the fact that Sin Tong Hyok, a "defector from the north", recently confessed that his "testimony" was a fabrication.
					 The U.S. and other hostile forces let Sin take the lead in the anti-DPRK "human rights" racket even in the UN arena.
					
					 The letter said Sin confessed himself before the international community that his "testimony" was a fabrication so the basis for the "human rights resolution" on the DPRK adopted at the 69th session of the UNGA has collapsed and that it proved the utterly unjust nature of the U.S. and other hostile forces' act of bringing in Sin and the likes to the UN arena, organizing the anti-DPRK "hearing" and railroading the "human rights resolution".
					
					 However, those who cooked up the fraudulent document including the former chairman of the "Commission of Inquiry" on the human rights situation in the DPRK are spreading the sophism that the "report of the COI on human rights" against the DPRK is based on the "testimonies" of hundreds of "defectors from the north" and Sin's is only a part of them, the letter said, adding that "if they manage to present the list of that hundreds of 'testifiers' they claim to have interviewed, we are ready to reveal to the whole world the true identifies of each and every one of them and the crimes committed and the lies told by them one by one."
					
					 The letter said that "in such a case, it will be more evident that the UN arena where the impartiality and objectivity become the principles of activities was misused for the anti-DPRK 'human rights' racket and this will result in deeply undermining the confidence the UN enjoys", and added the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" of the UN at issue was made up based on falsehood from A to Z and that the initiators of the "resolution" should be held accountable for making the countries that supported the "resolution" fall for the lies.
					
					  The DPRK foreign minister in the letter proposed the followings to the UN secretary-general and the UNGA session president:
					
					1. As the UN arena was reduced to a theatre of anti-DPRK "human rights" racket, I hope Your Excellencies will engage yourselves in correcting the situation and, for the immediate future, let all the member states of the UN know that the "resolution" adopted at the 69th session of the UNGA is an unlawful one falsely brought up and adopted based on the fabricated information and take due measures to revoke the "resolution".
					
					2. The initiators of the "resolution" including the EU and Japan have colluded to forcibly adopt the "resolution" by concocting frauds and falsehoods from the beginning and they have not interviewed even a single DPRK citizen while doing so. I hope Your Excellencies will urge them to admit this fact by themselves and to apologize for it to the international community.
					
					 The letter noted that it was a mockery of and an insult to the UN to frame up the "resolution" based on lies and fabrications, adding that if the "resolution" framed up by the hostile forces with information which was fully proven to be false before the international community is withdrawn, the DPRK is willing to actively engage itself in talks and cooperation in the field of human rights.

articles.title: Congratulations to President of Zimbabwe
articles.content:
Congratulations to President of Zimbabwe
						
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Robert G. Mugabe, president of the Republic of Zimbabwe, on the successful holding of the 24th Ordinary Session of the Assembly of Heads of State and Government of the African Union and on his election as chairman of the African Union.
					 The message said that the summit marked a significant occasion in demonstrating once again the efforts of the African countries to accelerate the process for the continental integration and meet the regional and world challenges as required by the developing times.
					
					 Reiterating the stand of the DPRK to steadily develop the traditional friendly and cooperative relations with the African countries, the message wished the African Union big progress in the work for the unity, development, peace and prosperity of the African continent.

articles.title: Congratulations to Revolutionary Party of Tanzania
articles.content:
Congratulations to Revolutionary Party of Tanzania
						
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to the National Executive Committee of the Revolutionary Party of Tanzania on the occasion of the 38th founding anniversary of the party.
					 The message wished the Revolutionary Party of Tanzania greater success in the work for developing the party and accomplishing the socio-economic development of the country, expressing belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties would grow stronger in the interests of the two peoples.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Blasts Remarks of "Special Rapporteur" of UN Human Rights Council
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Blasts Remarks of "Special Rapporteur" of UN Human Rights Council
						
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry on Feb. 4 gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA as regards the fact that the "special rapporteur" on human rights issue in the DPRK recently slung mud at the dignity of its supreme leadership:
					 Darusman, called "special rapporteur" on human rights issue in the DPRK of the UN Human Rights Council, in an interview with AP on Feb. 2 called for "change of leadership" in the DPRK, saying that "human rights and the present government can not coexist in north Korea".
					
					 His reckless remarks were just an imitation of calumnies on the DPRK of the U.S. ruling quarters obsessed with the inveterate repugnancy towards it, and this fully revealed his true colors as a dirty stooge under the veil of human rights champion who acts a shock brigade in implementing the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 It is no wonder that AP expressed astonishment at the remarks, saying that they could be heard only from U.S. officials.
					
					 Darusman threw mud at the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership absolutely trusted by its army and people. It is as foolish an act as trying to get the sun eclipsed by palms, and such impudent behavior deserves the punishment of Heaven.
					
					 In fact, he is implicated in the case of the massacre of 500 000 people linked to the leftist or labor groups in Indonesia in 1965 committed with CIA help. He is also a dirty man who is a member of the Global Leadership Foundation, whose patrons include U.S. unsavory characters.
					
					 Such guy, turned into a disgusting imposter and hack writer for money from the U.S., now goes recklessly to take the lead in the anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign. 
					
					 Darusman, a hand-raised stooge of the U.S., recruited "testifiers" like Sin Tong Hyok and took them from place to place to tell the false stories according to the U.S. scenario, so as to cook up an anti-DPRK "human rights resolution", befooling the international community. 
					
					 Upset by Sin's confession of his false "testimonies", Darusman is seeking to justify the false document, cooked up by himself, with sophism that it was based on "testimonies" of hundreds of people. 
					
					 To make it clearer, he should open to the public the names of hundreds of "defectors" from the DPRK whom he asserted he met. 
					
					 Then, the DPRK will reveal to the whole world the true identities of each and every one of those false "testifiers" and the crimes committed by them one by one. 
					
					 Consequently, the truth behind the anti-DPRK "human rights" racket by Darusman and his master, the U.S., will be brought to light more evidently.
					
					 The DPRK does never pardon anyone for hurting the dignity of its supreme leadership, and it is its unchangeable temper and will to defend the best socialist system of Korean style. 
					
					 The DPRK will continue to toughly counter the mad-cap anti-DPRK "human rights" racket the U.S. and other hostile forces kicked up by employing such dishonest elements as Darusman.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Take Practical Measures for Dialogue
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Take Practical Measures for Dialogue 
						
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea Wednesday gave an answer to a question put by KCNA as regards the fact that the south Korean authorities are spreading the rumor that dialogue has not started due to the north, toeing the line of the U.S. which is displeased with any effort to mend the inter-Korean relations. 
					 The spokesman said:
					
					 These days those of the Ministry of Unification of south Korea talk rubbish that the north should stop making exhausting assertions and come out for dialogue as early as possible if it has the willingness to mend the relations. Timed to coincide with this, the conservative media of south Korea are floating the rumor that it is hard to expect north-south dialogue for the time being due to the north. 
					
					 This is an intolerable insult to the DPRK's sincere efforts to bring about a great change in the north-south relations in this significant year and revelation of the clumsy and sinister intention to pass the buck for the daily escalating tension to it. 
					
					 Now the rabid dogs of the U.S. obsessed with the anti-DPRK hostile conception are openly barking that they will bring down the DPRK by leading it to "changes" in utter denial of its ideology and social system, and obstructing the south Korean authorities in every way so that they may not opt for mending the relations with it. This is well known to the world.
					
					 There are heaps of realistic issues pending solutions between the north and the south but there is not a single problem the south Korean authorities can settle without the U.S. interference. This is the DPRK's judgment.
					
					 It is the stark reality that without setting right the abnormal master-servant relations with the U.S. it is hard to expect a fundamental change in the north-south relations. The DPRK can never believe the south Korean authorities' will for dialogue as long as such situation goes on.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should not just pay lip-service to "dialogue" and "confidence" but make a bold decision to settle national issues and reunification issue with their fellow countrymen through frank discussions, free from the U.S. control, and show the will for the improvement of the relations by taking practical and trust-based measures.
					
					 They should also stop such acts of doing harm to fellow countrymen and escalating tensions by toeing to the U.S. policy.
					
					 To talk about "dialogue" without taking practical measures is not an attitude to truly settle the issue of the north-south relations. Such behavior cannot be interpreted otherwise than a poor charade to make the public at home and abroad believe that they are interested in improving the north-south ties and to shift the blame for the failure to open dialogue on to the DPRK side.
					
					 As we have repeatedly clarified our stand, we are fully ready to bring about a fresh landmark phase in the north-south relations for the dignity and destiny of the nation.
					
					 The prospect of the north-south relations entirely depends on the attitude of the south Korean authorities.

articles.title: Anniversary of Establishment of Diplomatic Ties between DPRK and Vietnam Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Establishment of Diplomatic Ties between DPRK and Vietnam Marked 
						
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- A meeting and film show took place at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel on Wednesday to mark the 65th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and the Socialist Republic of Vietnam.
					 Present there on invitation were Pham Viet Hung, Vietnamese ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials.
					
					 On hand were So Ho Won, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and chairman of the DPRK-Vietnam Friendship Association, officials concerned and people in the city.
					
					 So Ho Won in a speech referred to the traditional relations of friendship provided by President Kim Il Sung and President Ho Chi Minh for which the preceding leaders have shown deep concern.
					
					 The DPRK will as ever make efforts to invariably carry forward and develop the excellent tradition of solidarity and cooperation between the two peoples on the basis of the working class principle and revolutionary obligation, he noted.
					
					 Pham Viet Hung said that the historic meeting between respected Nong Duc Manh and General Secretary Kim Jong Il in Pyongyang in 2007 put the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries onto a higher stage.
					
					 He wished the fraternal Korean people greater successes in their struggle to improve the standard of people's living, build a thriving socialist nation and reunify the country independently and peacefully under the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 At the end of the meeting the participants watched Korean documental film "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il meets with Nong Duc Manh, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam" October 16-18, Juche 96 (2007).

articles.title: Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Hanoi
articles.content:
Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Hanoi
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- A reception was given at the DPRK embassy in Hanoi on Jan. 30 on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Vietnam.
					 Present there on invitation were the minister of Labor, War Wounded and Society of Vietnam, the deputy head of the General Political Department of the Vietnamese People's Army who is a member of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam, the vice-chairman of the Commission for External Affairs of the C.C., the CPV and other officials concerned.
					
					  Present there were Kim Chang Il, DPRK ambassador to Vietnam, and staff members of his embassy and a delegation of the DPRK Foreign Ministry led by Vice-Minister Ri Kil Song.
					
					 Floral baskets sent by the Commission for External Affairs of the C.C., the CPV, ministries of the government including the Foreign Ministry, organizations and institutions of Vietnam were placed before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The minister of Labor, War Wounded and Society of Vietnam in a speech at the reception said that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries provided by President Ho Chi Minh and President Kim Il Sung and cultivated by the leaders of several generations have been proved in practice to be precious assets for both sides.
					
					 He wished the Korean people greater successes in building a thriving socialist nation under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by First Secretary Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He hoped that the bilateral relations would further develop in conformity with the desire of the two peoples and the trend of the times this year marking the 65th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the two countries, the 85th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of Vietnam, the 70th anniversary of the national day of Vietnam, the 40th anniversary of the complete liberation of southern Vietnam and reunification of the country, the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation and the 70th anniversary of founding of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Meeting of Officials in Field of Land and Environmental Protection Held
articles.content:
Meeting of Officials in Field of Land and Environmental Protection Held
						
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- A meeting of officials in the field of land and environmental protection took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday.
					 Present there were leading officials of the party, state and army, vice-premiers, chief secretaries of provincial party committees, officials of working people's organizations, ministries, national institutions, armed forces organs and those in party and power organs and in the field of land and environmental protection and the units related to it in Pyongyang and local areas.
					
					 The meeting reviewed last year's work for land and environmental protection and discussed the issues to face-lift the appearance of the country's land as befitting that of a thriving socialist nation this year.
					
					 A report was made by Vice-Premier Kim Yong Jin to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers recalled that supreme leader Kim Jong Un clarified the orientation and ways for bringing about a turn in the work for reforestation, conservation of nature, protection of environment and city management.
					
					 They underscored the need for all provinces to arrange well exemplary greenhouses and generalize them at all tree nurseries in their cities and counties and thus successfully produce and supply saplings that are needed.
					
					 They called for arranging Pyongyang, provinces, cities and seats of counties, work sites and villages in a more civilized manner by the concerted efforts of service personnel and people and properly conduct the road construction and management.
					
					 They stressed the need to stage the work for securing water on a mass basis as well as concentrating forces on river improvement and thus effectively use water resources for agricultural production and economic development.
					
					 They called for pushing ahead with the work for further improving the ecological and living environment throughout the society and turning out in the work for protecting national heritage to preserve and further glorify the long history of the nation and its brilliant cultural tradition.
					
					 They called for decorating the great October festival with great successes by bringing about a revolutionary turn in the efforts for this year's general mobilization for land management.

articles.title: Participants in Study Tour Visit Phophyong Revolutionary Site
articles.content:
Participants in Study Tour Visit Phophyong Revolutionary Site
						
 Phophyong, February 4 (KCNA) -- Schoolchildren from across the country who participated in the study tour along the course of the 250-mile journey visited the Phophyong Revolutionary Site in Kim Hyong Jik County, Ryanggang Province on Wednesday. The study tour was sponsored on the occasions of the 90th anniversary of the 250-mile journey for national liberation made by President Kim Il Sung and the 40th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's organizing of the march along the course. 
					 There is at the revolutionary site the Phophyong Ferry which conveys the historic day when Kim Il Sung crossed the River Amnok, pledging not to return home unless Korea became independent.
					
					 There are also the Monument to "Song of the River Amnok", Phophyong Church where Kim Hyong Jik, an outstanding leader of the Korean anti-Japanese national liberation movement, conducted his revolutionary activities and a night school room of Hamgyong Provincial house where Kang Pan Sok, an outstanding leader of the Korean women's movement, educated women.
					
					 Exhibited at the revolutionary site are historic mementoes and data on the life of Kim Il Sung who embarked upon the road of revolution in his early years with a noble aim to achieve national liberation and the lives of the Mangyongdae family members who devoted their all to the sacred patriotic cause for the country and the nation.
					
					 Meanwhile, the participants in the study tour enjoyed an art performance given by members of the art group of the Kim Song Ju Schoolchildren's Palace on the same day.

articles.title: Paektusan Prize Sports Contest Opens
articles.content:
Paektusan Prize Sports Contest Opens
						
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The Paektusan Prize Sports Contest opened with due ceremony at the Basketball Gymnasium in Chongchun Street, Pyongyang on Wednesday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Various games including basketball, volleyball, table-tennis, skiing and speed skating will take place in Pyongyang, Phyongsong and Sariwon cities, Samjiyon and Pujon counties during the contest.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned and sports persons in Pyongyang.
					
					 Minister of Physical Culture and Sports Kim Yong Hun in an opening address said that all players and coaches should achieve good successes in the contest, true to the intention of the party to put the country's sports on the world level at an early date.
					
					 The ceremony was followed by men's basketball game between the Pyongyang Sports Team and the Sports Team of Kim Chaek University of Technology.

articles.title: June 9 Ryongbuk Senior Secondary School in Pyongyang
articles.content:
June 9 Ryongbuk Senior Secondary School in Pyongyang
						
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- June 9 Ryongbuk Senior Secondary School in Taesong District, Pyongyang, is well-known throughout the country for having run in an effective way the sports groups, table-tennis group in particular.
					 At the 40th National Schoolchildren's Sports Contest for Jongilbong Prize in 2014, the school finished first in men's table-tennis team event and took the first, second and third places in men's individual table-tennis event. The results made it a 10-time winner in national schoolchildren's contests.
					
					 It won gold medals in national table-tennis tournaments for four consecutive years from 2006 to 2009.
					
					 The school has taken the men's table-tennis title at the National Schoolchildren's Sports Contest for Jongilbong Prize each year from 2010. In 2012 it won the women's table-tennis title at the 18th National Schoolchildren's Festival of Loyalty.
					
					 The school's table-tennis level came under spotlight of the experts at the Junior Championships held last year.
					
					 Such successes are attributable to the painstaking efforts made by the school's sports teachers.

articles.title: DPRK's Invention Law Amended
articles.content:
DPRK's Invention Law Amended
						
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The Invention Law was recently amended and supplemented in the DPRK.
					 The law, adopted on May 13, Juche 87 (1998) and revised on March 11, 1999, consisted of five chapters and 43 articles.
					
					 The newly amended law breaks into five chapters and 64 articles.
					
					 The amendment and supplementation of the Invention Law is of great significance in further encouraging invention and facilitating its utilization as required by the IT era.

articles.title: Section Doctor System Taking Effective
articles.content:
Section Doctor System Taking Effective
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Medical workers in charge of families in Pyongyang are enhancing their role in medical service, true to the New Year address given by supreme leader Kim Jong Un, in which he called for improving preventive and curative medical care.
					 Among them are those at the Ryonhwa Polyclinic in Central District and Chongryu Polyclinic in Taedonggang District who are paying special attention to having consultation with the old, children and women and rendering medical services to them on a regular basis.
					
					 They are conducting sanitary agitation in residential quarters every early morning, while taking necessary measures in advance.
					
					 The section doctor system has been enforced from the 1960s in the DPRK, as part of the free medical services.

articles.title: Feats of KPA Guards Units (2)
articles.content:
Feats of KPA Guards Units (2)
						
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The Seoul Kim Chaek Guards 4th Infantry Division of the Korean People's Army performed heroic feats in the Fatherland Liberation War (June 25, 1950-July 27, 1953).
					 The division contributed to liberating Seoul three days after outbreak of the war in close cooperation with other KPA combined units.
					
					 On the way of southward advance, it liberated Suwon and swept away the U.S. "Smith commandos" in area of Osan.
					
					 In particular, the unit made distinguished feats in the operation to liberate Taejon City the south Korean puppet clique set as a temporary "capital".
					
					 Under the operational plan of President Kim Il Sung on encircling Taejon, the division advanced into the city while swiftly closing roads to it. After all, the city was liberated in seven hours since the start of the operation.
					
					 The Taejon siege operation resulted in annihilation of the U.S. 24th Infantry Division and the 1st and 7th divisions of the south Korean puppet army.
					
					 In August 1950, the division was awarded the title of Guards.
					
					 It also successfully performed the duty for defending the western coastal area.
					
					 During the war, the unit produced 30-odd awardees of the title of DPRK Hero and killed and arrested at least 38 000 enemy troops and destroyed several hundred pieces of combat equipment.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il visited the division on May 28, 1999, saying that the division's colors was a reminder of servicepersons who unhesitatingly dedicated their lives in the war to defend the party and the leader, the motherland and the people.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Authorities' Double-Dealing Attitude
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Authorities' Double-Dealing Attitude
						
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- It is an inveterate evil practice of the south Korean authorities to deteriorate the inter-Korean relations and quench the compatriots' desire for national reunification, pursuant to their policy of confrontation even though they cry out for the north-south dialogue and the improvement of the relations, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 If they escalate the confrontation with compatriots behind the scene while paying lip service to dialogue, the north-south dialogue and negotiations can never be realized.
					
					 The DPRK has taken practical steps on its own initiative from the outset of last year to mend the inter-Korean relations with the will of patriotism in order to improve the deteriorated relations. 
					
					 This being a hard reality, the south Korean authorities massively conducted anti-DPRK leaflet scattering operations in the area along the Military Demarcation Line just a few days after they reached an agreement with the DPRK. And they made desperate efforts to stage provocative joint military drills aimed at "occupying Pyongyang" in collusion with the U.S., mercilessly chilling the hard-won atmosphere of mending the relations.
					
					 The history and situation show that it is impossible to defuse the distrust and contradiction and mend the relations if they resort to escalating confrontation to meet a sinister intention while paying lip-service to dialogue and improvement of the relations.
					
					 All Koreans have made sincere efforts to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country with the noble will of patriotism, but the history of the north-south confrontation has lasted until now seven decades since national division, and the country has not yet been reunified. This is attributable to the double-dealing attitude and vicious action of treachery of the south Korean authorities.
					
					 They should seriously look back upon their past and reflect on their improper attitude at present that go against the will and interests of the nation, and make a responsible option.

articles.title: Minju Joson Lays Bare Japan's Nuclear Ambition
articles.content:
Minju Joson Lays Bare Japan's Nuclear Ambition
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- According to a recently declassified official document of the U.S., Japan sounded out the U.S. side's intention to lend nuclear weapons with the Japan-U.S. joint map exercise in Japan proper which used an A-bomb in the latter half of the 1950s as a momentum, and took an answer from the U.S. on sharing nukes in case of contingency.
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Wednesday says this tells that Japan has long worked hard to have access to nuclear weapons.
					
					 This fact clearly proves that the "non-nuclear" policy touted by Japan so far is nothing but a poor mask to conceal its wild ambition for nukes.
					
					 Clear is the aim persistently sought by Japan to have access to nukes while serving the U.S. as its master which imposed nuclear disasters on it.
					
					 Japan is still regarding its failure to possess nukes capable of turning the situation of war in its favor in a moment as the cause of its defeat in World War II. It is the sinister intention of Japan that it should possess nuclear weapons without fail in a bid to wipe away the shame of defeat and realize its old ambition for the "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere".
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are seeking to realize their militarist ambition for overseas expansion without fail by brandishing nuclear weapons and provoking wars of reinvasion.
					
					 They should know that the nuclear weaponization is as foolish an act as inviting their self-destruction, and stop at once two-faced act aimed to possess nuclear weapons under the veil of "denuclearization".

articles.title: UN "Human Rights Resolution" against DPRK Should Be Retracted: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
UN "Human Rights Resolution" against DPRK Should Be Retracted: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- It has been fully disclosed that the UN "human rights resolution" against the DPRK railroaded in December last year was a product of the "human rights" racket being kicked up by the U.S.-led hostile forces.
					 Sin Tong Hyok, who had appeared as a main "testifier" for working out the "report of the Commission of Inquiry" on the human rights performance in the DPRK, which served as a basis of the "resolution", confessed that his "testimonies" were false ones and pledged not to be involved in the "human rights campaign" against the DPRK any longer. This clearly proved that the "resolution" was a politically-motivated false document and a fabrication.
					
					 It also clearly proved that the "human rights" campaign kicked up by the U.S. at the UN and other international arenas is an illegal and brigandish act of wantonly infringing upon the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK.
					
					 Now that the falsity and reactionary nature of the "resolution" have been fully disclosed, the U.S. is persistently insisting on the "validity" of the "report" in a bid to justify the "human rights resolution" at any cost, far from apologizing to the DPRK for its wrongdoings. 
					
					 The former chairman and the "special rapporteur" of the CI are busy claiming the validity of the "report", asserting it is based not only on the "testimonies" made by Sin but also on those made by other "witnesses" in various countries.
					
					 The DPRK would like to ask them whether there was even a single citizen of it among those 300 odd "testifiers" they brought to make the "report" sound plausible and whether any of them has ever visited the DPRK.
					
					 The countries visited by the members of the CI are the countries hostile to the DPRK such as the U.S. and Japan and those met by them are either citizens of the hostile countries or "defectors from the north" under the control of the south Korean authorities.
					
					 In the early period of its establishment, the CI announced that it would conduct an inquiry on the basis of testimonies made by "defectors from the north" and satellite photos. The former chairman of the Commission, when interviewed by an Australian broadcasting service on May 7, 2013, told that there were various pieces of information on "human rights abuses in north Korea" but problem is lack of information to confirm them. Such utterances should not be overlooked.
					
					 Nevertheless, Washington formed the "Commission of Inquiry" with Kirby, Biserko and Darusman as its core members and instigated them to fabricate a false document. As far as those guys are concerned, they are all political swindlers who had been involved in the operations of the CIA.
					
					 After all, the "report" which they claimed comprehensively "judged" and "estimated" the human rights performance in the DPRK and contain even pieces of "recommendations" was worked out in a matter of less than a year. On the basis of it the UN forcibly adopted the anti-DPRK "resolution" bereft of scientific accuracy and credibility.
					
					 It was none other than the U.S. and its followers that let Sin appear as a leading "testifier" at the UN and other international arenas in a bid to forge the document peppered with frauds and lies.
					
					 Nevertheless, those who played a main role in working out the resolution are now asserting that Sin is just one of "many testifiers" and the "testimonies made by him are of no particular value." This is, indeed, the height of brazen-facedness.
					
					 This is not only a wanton challenge to the DPRK highly dignified for its independence as it guarantees genuine human rights of its popular masses but shameless hypocrisy and mockery of the fair-minded world public calling for total nullification of the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution."
					
					 With no rhetoric can those hostile forces misrepresent the true human rights performance in the DPRK.
					
					 Truth is bound to be revealed any time for history and the world public.
					
					 After Sin made an apology for his false testimonies, Blaine Harden, author and publisher of a book dealing with the story told by him about "the experience he gained while defecting from the north", contributed an article to a newspaper in which he admitted he was "deceived by Sin" and "Sin was an incredible guy from the very beginning and there would be more misinformation except for the one confessed by him."
					
					 It is by no means fortuitous that an Italian lawmaker, who had visited the DPRK, told Radio 24 of Italy that "all what defector from north Korea Sin Tong Hyok uttered at press conferences was lies meant to make money." "Books containing his lies are being sold and I, therefore, donâ€™t buy book falsifying facts," he added.
					
					 What matters is that the UN, forgetful of its mission and duty, danced to the tune of the U.S. conspiratorial moves and was abused by it for its anti-DPRK racket.
					
					 What the UN did seriously hurt its honor as it was the most disgraceful case in history.
					
					 It is a shame on the UN that it is being abused as an unlawful mechanism of mocking at the justice and truth under the control of a specified country called the U.S.
					
					 The UN should retract the above-said anti-DPRK "human rights resolution."

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Calls for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Calls for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The Academic Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration held a meeting in Seoul on Jan. 31 calling for implementing the north-south joint declaration, according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Minbo.
					 The organization issued a statement titled "Let us put an end to seven-decade long division through implementation of the June 15 declaration".
					
					 The statement referred to the situation in which the June 15 joint declaration has not been implemented. 
					
					 The present regime has suppressed those who call for implementing the June 15 joint declaration and achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the nation as the "forces following the north", it said.
					
					 It is necessary to thoroughly implement the June 15 joint declaration in order to put an end to the seven-decade history of division, it noted.
					
					 It demanded the regime lift the "May 24 steps" and opt for dialogue and exchange with the north.

articles.title: S. Korean Military Keen on North-targeted War Drills
articles.content:
S. Korean Military Keen on North-targeted War Drills
						
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean military are persisting in the war drills to invade the DPRK.
					 The First Marine Division announced that it would stage field mobile exercises in the Phohang area of North Kyongsang Province from Feb. 3 to 5, according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					
					 Huge forces and equipment will reportedly be involved in the drills.
					
					 During the same period the "capital city corps" of the army is mulling staging a war drill in the areas of Inchon and Kyonggi Province together with the Second Marine Division.
					
					 This fully reveals the confrontational nature of the south Korean military warmongers joining the U.S. in its moves for invading the DPRK.

articles.title: Action for National Reunification Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Action for National Reunification Called for in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration held a rally in Seoul on Jan. 30 at which it called for waging a dynamic struggle to mend inter-Korean relations and reunify the country.
					 Speakers said at the rally that this year marked the 15th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration, calling upon the people in the south and the north and abroad to join efforts for national reunification.
					
					 The present regime is excluding the non-governmental movement for reunification from the issues of reunification and south-north relations, they charged.
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration is a truly realistic great programme for reunification, they said.
					
					 In a resolution the organization said now is the time to make efforts to mend south-north relations. It went on:
					
					 We will continue the efforts to preserve and implement the July 4 joint statement, the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, agreements for reunification jointly made by the south and the north.
					
					 We will make all efforts to make sure that prerequisite steps are taken to halt the acts of slinging mud at each other and all military threats and improve south-north relations including the lifting of the "May 24 steps" and resumption of civilian exchange.
					
					 We will successfully hold events common to the nation, the gatherings for national reconciliation and peace, which had been suspended, on the occasions of June 15 and August 15 (Korea's liberation).

articles.title: Release of Progressive Activist Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Release of Progressive Activist Urged in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Measure Committee for Release of Hwang Son and Her Reinstatement held a press conference on January 29 in denunciation of the  authorities' suppression of a progressive activist, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Jaju Minbo.
					 It demanded the authorities stop the racket for "eliminating followers of the north" and the "witch hunt" and guarantee the freedom of expression.
					
					 It said that it would stage various forms of actions for releasing Hwang.

articles.title: Ceaseless Actions for Probing Truth behind Ferry Sewol Disaster Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Ceaseless Actions for Probing Truth behind Ferry Sewol Disaster Called for in S. Korea 
						
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- South Korean people of different social standings expressed the will to wage ceaseless actions for probing the truth behind the ferry Sewol disaster despite obstructions of the conservative forces. 
					 The Seoul City authorities, at the prodding of the conservative forces, sent an official notice to the sit-in strikers, urging them to be ready for the withdrawal of the tents in the venue of the sit-in they were launching at the Kwanghwamun plaza in Seoul on January 26. 
					
					 In this regard, a person concerned with the All-People Measure Council for Sewol Disaster said on January 31 that the conservative forces pressed the Seoul City authorities although the probe into the truth behind the disaster had not begun and majority of the citizens expressed sympathy with the demand for the probe. 
					
					 The "government" is not thinking of proper probe into the truth though it set up a fact-finding committee, the person said, adding that they would protect the venue of sit-in till the truth is probed. 
					
					 Meanwhile, on Jan. 26, 300 days after the disaster bereaved families and other people marched from the joint incense-burning altar in Ansan, Kyonggi Province, to Phaengmok Port in Jindo, South Jolla Province.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Celebrated in Different Countries
						
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 A reading session on a work of Marshal Kim Jong Un was held in Nigeria and round-table talks in Angola and Germany on Jan. 26 and 28.
					
					 The chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Juche Philosophy read out Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Step Up the Building of a Thriving Country by Applying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism", and said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il loved the country and its people more warmly than anyone else and devoted his whole life to the prosperity of the country and the happiness of its people.
					
					 Thanks to his wise leadership, Korea, a weak colonial country one century ago, has demonstrated its might as a worldwide military power with matchless military capabilities.
					
					 The appearance of the DPRK has been face-lifted and the eternal foundation for building a thriving nation provided thanks to his long journey of patriotic devotion.
					
					 The chief of a special project room of the Angolan Presidency said that Kim Jong Il defended the dignity of the nation and the sovereignty of the country and consolidated the single-minded unity by pursuing his Songun politics.
					
					 His great career and feats will shine long as he devoted his all to justice, truth and the cause of independence, the chief noted.
					
					 The chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany said that the reverence for Kim Jong Il is growing stronger on the threshold of the Day of the Shining Star (his birth anniversary). He went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il brought the happiness of the people into bloom and opened up the bright future of mankind.
					
					 He turned the DPRK into a military power with nuclear deterrent with his extraordinary military wisdom and resolute determination.
					
					 The DPRK is becoming a beacon of hope for world progressives.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Celebrated in Different Countries
						
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in Romania and Indonesia and a joint gathering in Benin on Jan. 23 and 26 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 The chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania said:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il is the great leader of the Korean people and the distinguished leader of the world revolution who made undying contributions to the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence.
					
					 The DPRK could demonstrate its might as a socialist power of Juche entirely thanks to his wise leadership.
					
					 That is why the Korean people are significantly celebrating his birth anniversary as the Day of the Shining Star, holding him in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The director of the Rabitra Bahtera Pratama Co. of Indonesia and other speakers praised Kim Jong Il as the peerless great man who led the cause of human independence to victory with matchless idea and leadership ability.
					
					 The chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" who doubles as chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and chairman of the Beninese national preparatory committee for celebrating the 73rd birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il noted in his speech:
					
					 Kim Jong Il provided a sure guarantee for peace on the Korean peninsula, pursuing the Songun politics from dozens of years ago.
					
					 He resolutely repulsed the military provocations by the U.S. with his iron pluck and grit.
					
					 The feats he performed for world peace and security will always be remembered by mankind.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event in Benin.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Carried by Russian Newspaper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Carried by Russian Newspaper
						
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The gist of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's New Year address was carried by the Russian newspaper Nakhodkinski Rabochi on January 21.
					 The paper carried his photo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website of German Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website of German Organization
						
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" was posted on the website of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany on January 29.
					 The work, published on January 29, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies the idea that the Songun-based revolutionary line, the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea, is an effective political mode in the present era that has carried forward and developed President Kim Il Sung's idea and line on attaching importance to the army.
					
					 It also clarifies the idea that it is a scientific and revolutionary line and political mode most correctly meeting the requirements of the times and the revolution.

articles.title: CDN sentencia la caida definitiva del imperialismo norteamericano
articles.content:
CDN sentencia la caida definitiva del imperialismo norteamericano
						
Pyongyang, 4 de febrero (ACNC) -- Desde principios de este ano, Obama proclamo nueva "sancion adicional" contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea a traves de la "orden administrativa del presidente" y el 22 de enero, calumnio a la RPDC como "pais dictatorial mas aislado, cerrado y cruel".
					Chismeo que "tal poder se derrumbara con el paso de tiempo" y hay que "derrocarlo" cuanto antes a traves de la entrada de informaciones  por la guerra cibernetica.
					
					Ademas, los cabecillas del circulo politico y el militar de EE.UU. estan enloquecidos para hacer mas ferreo el bloqueo para aislar y atropellar a la RPDC al volver a definirla como "pais que patrocina el terrorismo" y aplicarle la "sancion adicional superdura".
					
					Por ejemplo, bajo el pretexto del "mantenimiento del sistema combinado", acordaron realizar en el Sur de Corea y sus alrededores todos los ejercicios de guerra planeados, incluso "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle".
					
					Debatieron en secreto en la comandancia de las tropas de operacion especial de Florida como eliminar las armas nucleares y misiles de la RPDC y fundaron la division combinada EE.UU.-Sur de Corea para ese fin.
					
					Al respecto, el Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 4 una declaracion que expone al interior y exterior la siguiente posicion de principios del ejercito y pueblo coreanos:
					
					1.  Puesto que la politica hostil anti-RPDC del gangsteril imperialismo norteamericano se torna cada vez mas imprudente y brutal, sera mas duro el enfrentamiento de justicia de nuestro ejercito y pueblo para frustrarla.
					
					  En otro tiempo, los autores de la politica norteamericana decian cinicamente que no tienen la politica hostil anti-RPDC.
					
					Sin embargo, Obama revelo por si solo que la politica sobre Corea de su pais es la mas hostil y su proposito principal es "derrumbar" a la RPDC.
					
					Nuestro ejercito y pueblo elevaran ilimitadamente el grado de enfrentamiento de justicia mientras se pone mas cruel y extremada la politica hostil anti-RPDC de EE.UU., se recrudece el nivel de sancion y presion y se amplian la dimension y esfera de los ejercicios de guerra contra la RPDC.
					
					EE.UU. debe conocer bien que desde hace mucho tiempo, en nuestro pais todos los habitantes y miliares estan usando en comun la frase "el imperialismo yanqui es enemigo jurado" y que el revanchismo anti-EE.UU., que calienta este territorio llamando a exterminar y dar muerte, se expande ahora hacia el territorio norteamericano, cuartel general de criminales.
					
					2.  Ya que la estrategia militar del gangsteril imperialismo norteamericano sobre la RPDC llega a la fase de provocacion de la guerra de agresion, el enfrentamiento de justicia de nuestro ejercito y pueblo se enfocara en hacer sufrir la tragedia mas amarga a los Estados Unidos de America.
					
					Desde el principio, el imperialismo yanqui es la banda de bandidos enviciados en invertir la verdad y provocar la guerra con complots y fraudes.
					
					EE.UU. es el autor de la escalada de la guerra de agresion contra Vietnam desatada inventando el incidente del golfo Bac Bo y ocupo a Irak con la farsa de "eliminacion de armas de exterminio masivo". En la decada de 1950, provoco la guerra de agresion contra la RPDC pretextando la "agresion al Sur".
					
					Hoy dia, la banda de Obama fabrica el inexistente " problema de DDHH" de la RPDC e intenta "derrocarla" con la guerra cibernetica circulando el rumor de que el hacking contra "SONY Pictures" es "obra del Norte de Corea (RPDC)".
					
					Ante esta circunstancia peligrosa, nuestro ejercito y pueblo decidieron escribir precisamente en el territorio norteamericano con los fusiles del monte Paektu la ultima pagina de arruinamiento definitivo que dara punto final a la historia vergonzosa de EE.UU. que registro solo las derrotas.
					
					Adelantaremos la caida final de EE.UU. con la guerra convencional, el ataque nuclear y la guerra cibernetica por nuestro estilo si el imperio impone la guerra de agresion con las fuerzas convencionales, provoca la guerra de agresion con las fuerzas nucleares e intenta "derrumbarnos" con la guerra cibernetica. Esto es nuestra opcion resuelta.
					
					EE.UU. debe conocer bien que el minimizado, preciso y diversificado medio de ataque nuclear y los medios de guerra terrestre, maritima, submarina, aerea y cibernetica de la RPDC se aplicaran segun el espiritu invencible, la idea y voluntad indoblegables y la autoctona estrategia y tactica y los particulares metodos de combate de nuestro ejercito y pueblo, sin precedentes en la historia de guerra mundial, los que no puede tener ni imitar el bandidesco imperialismo norteamericano.
					
					3. No tenemos la necesidad ni voluntad de conversar mas con los tipejos norteamericanos mientras el gangsteril imperialismo norteamericano este desesperado para suprimir nuestra idea y "derrumbar" nuestro regimen. Esto es la decision resuelta de nuestro ejercito y pueblo.
					
					La banda de Obama suele decir que se debe inducir el cambio de la RPDC y el "derrumbe" de su regimen, a traves de la "estrategia de dos alternativas": la "presion" con la fuerza y el "dialogo".
					
					Nuestro ejercito y pueblo anuncian formalmente a la administracion Obama de los Estados Unidos de America que no tenemos la necesidad ni voluntad de conversar y tratarse mas con EE.UU., mientras el gangsteril imperialismo norteamericano con la desventura en su futuro hable del "derrumbe" de la RPDC ignorando su situacion miserable.
					
					La banda de Obama debe dejar de decir a todo el mundo los chismes como que el dialogo es posible cuando "haya primero el cambio".
					
					Al igual que el pasado, continuan hoy y continuaran siempre en el futuro la tradicion de victoria eterna de la RPDC y la de verguenza y derrota del imperialismo norteamericano, registradas en la historia de enfrentamiento RPDC-EE.UU.
					
					Llega al cielo el impetu de nuestro ejercito y pueblo decididos a ajustar las cuentas finales con el bandidesco imperialismo norteamericano mediante la batalla superintransigente nunca vista antes.
					
					El gangsteril imperialismo norteamericano, enloquecido siglo tras siglo por la politica hostil anti-RPDC, debe tener presente que se acerca cada vez mas el momento de pesadilla en que sufrira la caida definitiva mas tragica en el territorio propio.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong envia cartas a Ban Ki-Moon y presidente de Asamblea General de la ONU
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong envia cartas a Ban Ki-Moon y presidente de Asamblea General de la ONU
Pyongyang, 4 de febrero (ACNC) -- El ministro de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Ri Su Yong, envio el dia 2, sendas cartas al secretario general y al presidente de la Asamblea General de la ONU, en relacion con que el "fugitivo norcoreano" Sin Tong Hyok reconocio que el mismo hizo el testimonio mentiroso en la arena de la ONU en cuanto a los derechos humanos de la RPDC bajo la instigacion de EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles.
					La carta senala que de esta manera se destruyo la base de la "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC aprobada a fuerza en la 69a reunion de la Asamblea General de la ONU del ano pasado y fue comprobado cuan injusta era la dicha resolucion aprobada por EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles llevando a la "audiencia" a Sin Tong Hyok y otras escorias humanas.
					
					A pesar de ello, el ex presidente del "comite de investigacion" referente a la situacion de DDHH de Corea y otros promotores del  documento fraudulento disparatean que el "informe de DDHH" anti-RPDC esta basado en los "testimonios" de cientos de los "fugitivos norcoreanos" y el testimonio de Sin es una parte de ellos, menciona y continua que si ellos presentan la lista de esos "testigos" estamos dispuestos a revelar a todo el mundo la faz  verdadera, crimenes y mentiras de cada uno de ellos.
					
					En ese caso, sera mas claro el que la ONU que toma la imparcialidad y la objetividad como principio de sus actividades fue abusada para la campana de "DDHH" anti- RPDC y se vendra al suelo la confianza de la ONU, senala y subraya que la "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC fue inventada a base de las mentiras, y los promotores de esa "resolucion" deben responsabilizarse de lo que hicieron que los paises a favor de dicha "resolucion" la consideraran como verdad.
					
					Al respecto, el canciller coreano presento, al secretario general y al presidente de la Asamblea General, de la ONU, los siguientes problemas:
					
					1. Esperamos que arreglen la situacion de que la ONU fue convertida en la escena caotica de la campana de "DDHH" anti- RPDC y en la etapa inmediata, tomen las medidas correspondientes para que todos los paises miembros de la ONU se enteren de que la "resolucion" de la 69a reunion de la Asamblea General fue basada en los datos falsificados y presentada y aprobada de manera fraudulenta e ilegal y que se invalide esa "resolucion".
					
					2. Esperamos que demanden con urgencia a la Union Europea, Japon y otros promotores de la "resolucion" a reconocer por si mismos y pedir disculpas ante la sociedad internacional, de lo que la aprobaron mediante la conspiracion y fraudes sin entrevistarse con ninguno de los ciudadanos de la RPDC.
					
					Por ultimo, la carta senala que la aprobacion de la "resolucion" es la burla e insulto a la ONU y que tenemos la voluntad de realizar activamente el dialogo y la cooperacion en la rama de derechos humanos si se retira la "resolucion" inventada por las fuerzas hostiles basandose en los datos falsos revelados totalmente en la sociedad internacional.

articles.title: CRPP urge a autoridades surcoreanas tomar medidas practicas
articles.content:
CRPP urge a autoridades surcoreanas tomar medidas practicas
						
Pyongyang, 4 de febrero (ACNC) -- Obedeciendo a EE.UU., que no desea la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas, las autoridades surcoreanas inducen en error la opinion publica hablando como si el dialogo no se abriera por culpa de la RPDC.
					Al respecto, el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria dio hoy a la ACNC la siguiente respuesta:
					
					Ultimamente, los interesados del Ministerio de Unificacion del Sur de Corea dicen que el "Norte (de Corea) debe proceder cuanto antes al dialogo abandonando su insistencia de desgaste si tiene la voluntad de mejorar las relaciones".
					
					Sumandose a ellos, los medios de prensa conservadores propagan el rumor de que por culpa del Norte de Corea, se hizo dificil esperar el dialogo intercoreano.
					
					Tal conducta es un insulto intolerable a los esfuerzos sinceros de la RPDC por registrar grandes cambios en las relaciones intercoreanas en este ano significativo y constituye una expresion del siniestro intento de imputar a ella la responsabilidad de la situacion actual en que se agravan dia a dia las tensiones.
					
					Todo el mundo conoce bien el hecho de que los norteamericanos, enloquecidos por la hostilidad anti-RPDC, niegan la idea y el regimen de la RPDC y abogan abiertamente por derrumbarla mediante el llamado "cambio" y obstaculizan de una manera u otra para que las autoridades surcoreanas no procedieran al mejoramiento de relaciones con la RPDC.
					
					El juicio de la RPDC  es que no existen los problemas a ser resueltos por las autoridades surcoreanas excluyendo al imperio si bien hay practicamente muchos asuntos pendientes entre ambas partes coreanas.
					
					No se puede esperar el cambio radical en las relaciones intercoreanas sin que las autoridades surcoreanas corrijan las anormales relaciones con el imperio, o sea, las relaciones verticales entre el amo y el sirviente. Mientras prosiga tal estado, la RPDC no podra confiar jamas en la voluntad de dialogo de las autoridades surcoreanas.
					
					En vez de hablar por hablar del "dialogo" y la "confianza", ellas deberan tomar la valiente decision de solucionar francamente con los connacionales los asuntos nacionales y el de reunificacion al liberarse del dominio del imperio norteamericano y mostrar su voluntad de mejorar las relaciones con medidas sustanciales y confiables.
					
					Y deben dejar de cometer acciones que hacen danos a la parte connacional y agravan la situacion siguiendo ciegamente a su amo gringo.
					
					Hablar del "dialogo" sin tomar tales medidas reales no es actitud para resolver sinceramente las relaciones intercoreanas y deviene ademas una farsa torpe para enganar a la opinion publica interna y externa como si tuvieran interes en la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas y para imputar a la RPDC la responsabilidad del estancamiento del dialogo.
					
					Como hemos reiterado, estamos preparados para abrir nueva coyuntura de cambio en las relaciones intercoreanas en pro de la dignidad y el destino de la nacion.
					
					El futuro de las relaciones Norte-Sur depende totalmente de la actitud de las autoridades surcoreanas.

articles.title: Efectuada reunion de funcionarios de sector de proteccion territorial y ambiental
articles.content:
Efectuada reunion de funcionarios de sector de proteccion territorial y ambiental
Pyongyang, 4 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar hoy en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo la reunion de funcionarios del sector de proteccion territorial y ambiental.
					Estuvieron presentes los cuadros responsables del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los vicepremieres, los secretarios responsables de los comites del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en las provincias y los funcionarios de las entidades de masas, ministerios, organos centrales, instituciones de las fuerzas armadas, las organizaciones del partido y el poder en el centro y las localidades y las ramas de proteccion territorial y ambiental y las unidades concernientes. 
					
					La reunion hizo balance de la labor de movilizacion general para la administracion territorial realizada el ano pasado y discutio los asuntos de renovar este ano el aspecto del territorio conforme a la fisonomia de un Estado prospero socialista.
					
					Hubo el informe del vicepremier Kim Yong Jin e intervenciones.
					
					Los oradores senalaron que el Mariscal Kim Jong Un aclaro el rumbo y los remedios para registrar cambios en la repoblacion forestal, la proteccion de la naturaleza, la ambiental y el urbanismo, y prosiguieron:
					
					Las provincias de todo el pais deben acondicionar bien este ano los invernaderos modelos y producir con suficiencia las posturas de arboles necesarias al generalizarlos en las almacigas de ciudades y distritos.
					
					Debemos acondicionar mas bien con las fuerzas unidas del ejercito y el pueblo la ciudad de Pyongyang, las ciudades locales y las cabeceras provinciales y distritales, centros de trabajo y aldeas y llevar bien la construccion y mantenimiento de carreteras.
					
					Debemos concentrar la fuerza en la construccion y la reparacion de rios y al mismo tiempo aprovechar eficazmente el recurso de agua en la produccion agricola y el desarrollo economico al realizar el aseguramiento de agua como movimiento de todas las masas.
					
					Debemos impulsar como trabajo de toda la sociedad la labor por mejorar mas el habitat y el ambiente de vida y defender y glorificar mas la larga historia y las brillantes tradiciones culturales de la nacion al levantarnos como un solo un solo hombre en la proteccion del patrimonio nacional.
					
					Condecoremos con exitos relevantes el gran festival de octubre al lograr este ano los cambios revolucionarios en la movilizacion general para la administracion territorial.

articles.title: Inaugurada competencia deportiva por premio Paektusan
articles.content:
Inaugurada competencia deportiva por premio Paektusan
						
Pyongyang, 4 de febrero (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurada la competencia deportiva por el premio Paektusan en ocasion del dia de natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					Durante la cita, se realizaran en las ciudades de Pyongyang, Phyongsong y Sariwon, y los distritos de Samjiyon y Pujon los partidos de varias disciplinas tales como baloncesto, voleibol, ping pong, esqui y patinaje de velocidad.
					
					La ceremonia inaugural tuvo lugar hoy en el centro de baloncesto del capitalino reparto Chongchun.
					
					Tomaron parte en la ocasion Choe Ryong Hae, secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, los funcionarios interesados y los deportistas capitalinos.
					
					En su discurso de la ocasion, Kim Yong Hun, ministro de Deportes, dijo que todos los jugadores y entrenadores deben obtener buenos resultados en la presente cita en acato al proposito del partido de elevar cuanto antes al nivel mundial los deportes del pais.
					
					Terminada la ceremonia, hubo el torneo de baloncesto masculino entre los conjuntos deportivos de Pyongyang y de la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek.
